original_title: 臀撃おしおき娘ゴータマンR（リターン）〜愛と悲しみのファイナルバトル
overview: On her final confrontations with the Black Buddha Gang, Mari Amachi is unable to conceal her secret identity from the few important individuals in her life. Her career as heroine who fights for the freedom of religion is in serious jeopardy as never before.
title: Butt Attack Punisher Girl Gautaman R: The Final Battle Between Love & Tragedy!
